docs.snippet: French actress Isabelle Huppert was as shocked as the rest of the room when presenter Leonardo DiCaprio announced that she had indeed won the Golden Globe for best actress in a drama for her role in the controversial film "Elle," in which she play...
docs.lead_paragraph: French actress Isabelle Huppert was as shocked as the rest of the room when presenter Leonardo DiCaprio announced that she had indeed won the Golden Globe for best actress in a drama for her role in the controversial film "Elle," in which she plays a woman who is raped.

headline.main: Isabelle Huppert Is Shocked by Win for Controversial 'Elle'
headline.print_headline: Isabelle Huppert Is Shocked by Win for Controversial 'Elle'

docs.snippet: Beijing and other cities across northern and central China were shrouded in thick smog last week, prompting authorities to delay dozens of flights and close highways. Beijing authorities issued an "orange alert," the third level in China's four-ti...
docs.lead_paragraph: Beijing and other cities across northern and central China were shrouded in thick smog last week, prompting authorities to delay dozens of flights and close highways. Beijing authorities issued an "orange alert," the third level in China's four-tiered warning system, while more than 20 other cities were on the highest "red alert."

docs.snippet: Actress Meryl Streep turned a Golden Globe acceptance speech into a scathing attack on U.S. President-elect Donald Trump, saying she had been heartbroken by his imitation of a disabled reporter during his campaign....

headline.main: Meryl Streep Lambastes Trump in Golden Globes Speech
